name: 3dmaskdump
author: AFNI Team
description: Outputs voxel values from AFNI datasets satisfying mask criteria to an ASCII file.

inputs.description: Input datasets to dump voxel values
inputs.name: Input datasets

inputs.description: Use the dataset as a mask. Only voxels with nonzero values in the mask will be printed from the input dataset.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Further restrict the voxels from mask dataset to those mask values between 'a' and 'b' (inclusive).
inputs.name: Mask range

inputs.description: Write out the dataset index values.
inputs.name: Output index values

inputs.description: Do not write out the i,j,k values.
inputs.name: Exclude i,j,k values

inputs.description: Write the x,y,z coordinates from the first input dataset at the start of each output line.
inputs.name: Output x,y,z coordinates

inputs.description: Write output to specified file.
inputs.name: Output filename

inputs.description: Execute options enclosed as a 3dcalc-like program to produce a mask from the resulting 3D brick.
inputs.name: 3dcalc-like mask options

inputs.description: Put a 'mask' at dataset coordinates 'x y z' mm.
inputs.name: Dataset coordinates for mask

inputs.description: Put a 'mask' at RAI/DICOM coordinates of 'x y z' mm.
inputs.name: RAI/DICOM coordinates for mask

inputs.description: Put a 'mask' at LPI/SPM coordinates of 'x y z' mm.
inputs.name: LPI/SPM coordinates for mask

inputs.description: Put a 'mask' at voxel indexes 'i j k'.
inputs.name: Voxel indexes for mask

inputs.description: Put a ball (sphere) mask at dataset coordinates (x,y,z) with radius r.
inputs.name: Coordinates and radius for ball mask

inputs.description: Put a ball (sphere) mask at RAI/DICOM coordinates (x,y,z) with radius r.
inputs.name: RAI/DICOM Coordinates and radius for ball mask

inputs.description: Put a ball (sphere) mask at LPI/SPM coordinates (x,y,z) with radius r.
inputs.name: LPI/SPM Coordinates and radius for ball mask

inputs.description: Skip output of any voxel where all the data values are zero.
inputs.name: Exclude zero values

inputs.description: Keep only N_RAND randomly selected voxels from what would have been the output.
inputs.name: Number of random voxels

inputs.description: Seed the random number generator with SEED.
inputs.name: Random seed

inputs.description: Output data in the XML/NIML format compatible with input back to AFNI via the READ_NIML_FILE command.
inputs.name: NIML format output

inputs.description: Do not print progress messages to stderr.
inputs.name: Quiet mode

output-files.description: Output ASCII file with voxel values
output-files.name: Output file
